554790.name: Party Hard Remastered OST
554790.description:
Bring Party Hard OST with you. This is the reimagined soundtrack that replaces the one in the original Party Hard release. We licensed the music without rights to sell initially, and that caused a ton of issues and copyright claims on YouTube. So we rewrote the whole OST and now it can be yours!
Tracklist:

01 Beat Dreams
02 I Said We Party Tonight
03 Wild Of Bass
04 I Am Trouble
05 Shine Bright
06 Heart Of The Beat
07 He Knows You're A Dancer
08 Lucky
09 Keep It Going
10 Golden Tomorrow
11 E-Motions
12 Wild Mind
554790.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 罗马尼亚语, 法语, 乌克兰语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
